#summary Suggested Assignment #2 - Greedy AI

= Introduction =

The purpose of this assignment is for the student to create a heuristic method that can value certain moves above other moves.

When the student is done with this assignment, the AI will be able to pick the best immediate move, meaning that the AI will only look 1 move ahead.


= Requirements =

 * Create a method that takes a board and a move and sets the value of the move based on some heuristic.
 * *All* chess moves should show up in the !DecisionTree with their values.
 * The Chosen move should show up with the "->" next to it in the !DecisionTree.
